del.t-attf-class: text-danger mr-1 te_p_disc {{'' if combination_info['has_discounted_price'] else 'd-none'}}

a.t-attf-class: btn btn-secondary btn-sm a-submit not_product_page te_theme_button #{'disabled out_of_stock' if product.sudo().virtual_available < 1 and product.inventory_availability in ['always', 'threshold'] else ''}
a.title: Shopping cart
a.t-att-id: 'add_to_cart' if ajax_cart and not product.optional_product_ids else ''

a.title: Shopping cart
